H0.text: Blood is the substance that all living things require to survive.

H1.text: Water is the substance that all living things require to survive.

H2.text: Carbon dioxide is the substance that all living things require to survive.

H3.text: Organic soil is the substance that all living things require to survive.

A4.text: Water is vital for all known forms of life, despite not providing food energy or being an organic micronutrient.

A5.text: Water is fundamental to both photosynthesis and respiration.
